title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/prolite_agnes_hitlad.html
notes: Conor O'Prolite, last seen in I MIGHT JUST SPEAR YOUR LIFE, returns  to deal with another contract killer. The killer tries to frighten money out of a girl (who isn't a girl) and then shake her down for her laptop.

messages.body:
Featuring  (Conor O'Prolite's god-daughter). Some bad language as I just felt like abusing him.
Cast
 (10 year old "victim")
 (Hitlad) (harrypork_1373@yahoo.com) (we do not make these names up)
 (Aggie's father)
Real dating agency, so name withheld.
Two courier firms, with 0% success rates and malfunctioning tracking systems. 
 
I finally ended it, as I think he'd realized it was a bait.
messages.raw:
Featuring Agnes Slapper (Conor O'Prolite's god-daughter). Some bad language as I just felt like abusing him.

Cast
Agnes Slapper (10 year old "victim")
Harrison Porker (Hitlad) (harrypork_1373@yahoo.com) (we do not make these names up)
Adam Slapper (Aggie's father)
Real dating agency, so name withheld.
Two courier firms, with 0% success rates and malfunctioning tracking systems.

I finally ended it, as I think he'd realized it was a bait.

messages.body: This is the only way I could contact you for now,I want you to be very careful about this and keep this secret with you until I make out space for us to see. You have no need of knowing who I am or where I am from.I know this may sound very surprising to you but it's the situation. the problem is, if i do'nt KILL YOU somebody else will. i have been paid some ransom in advance to terminate you with some reasons listed to me by my employer.It's someone I believe you call a friend, Do not contact the police or try to send a copy of this to them,because if you do, I will know,and might be pushed to do what I have been paid to do, this is the 1st time I turn out to be a betrayer in my job. I took pity on you,that is why I have made up my mind to help you if you are willing to help yourself.
messages.raw:
Hitlad
This is the only way I could contact you for now,I want you to be very careful about this and keep this secret with you until I make out space for us to see. You have no need of knowing who I am or where I am from.I know this may sound very surprising to you but it's the situation. the problem is, if i do'nt KILL YOU somebody else will. i have been paid some ransom in advance to terminate you with some reasons listed to me by my employer.It's someone I believe you call a friend, Do not contact the police or try to send a copy of this to them,because if you do, I will know,and might be pushed to do what I have been paid to do, this is the 1st time I turn out to be a betrayer in my job. I took pity on you,that is why I have made up my mind to help you if you are willing to help yourself.

[This is an example of the Hired Killer letter.]

messages.body:
You're scaring me. I'm only 10 years old, so why does someone want
                        me dead? I haven't got that sort of money. Can I ask my pa what I   should do?
 
                        Agnes Slapper.
messages.raw:
Agnes
You're scaring me. I'm only 10 years old, so why does someone want me dead? I haven't got that sort of money. Can I ask my pa what I should do?

Agnes Slapper.

messages.body:
Only $91.37 (Ninety one dollars thirty seven cents). Please don't
                        kill me.
 
                        Aggie

Agnes
Only $91.37 (Ninety one dollars thirty seven cents). Please don't kill me.

Aggie

messages.body:
You are a worthless piece of shit!
 
I was doing a weekly virus scan of my daughter's laptop, and found your email exchange. Now I know 
why she's seemed so upset for the past two days, and why she tried to steal my credit card.
 
What sort of creature ( I can't use the word "man") threatens to kill a 10 year old girl, extort money from her, 
and asks her to steal from her parents? I've met many evil people during my military career, but never anyone l
ike you. How do you sleep at night, or look at yourself in a mirror?
 
When (not if) I find you, you'll wish you'd never been born.
 
Colonel Adam Slapper.  Special Forces (United States Army).
messages.raw:
Col. Adam Slapper

[Enter Aggie's pa!]

You are a worthless piece of shit!

I was doing a weekly virus scan of my daughter's laptop, and found your email exchange. Now I know why she's seemed so upset for the past two days, and why she tried to steal my credit card.

What sort of creature ( I can't use the word "man") threatens to kill a 10 year old girl, extort money from her, and asks her to steal from her parents? I've met many evil people during my military career, but never anyone l ike you. How do you sleep at night, or look at yourself in a mirror?

When (not if) I find you, you'll wish you'd never been born.

Colonel Adam Slapper. Special Forces (United States Army).

dipshit fucking scammer who couldn't find his ass with both hands.
At least I think that's what he meant. I didn't know all the words
he used. I'm only ten.
 
Guess I don't have to pay you $50 now, so I'm going swimming.
Byee!

messages.body:
Pa says you're a fucking spammer, and you say you're a real hired
killer. I don't know who to believe!
 
Anyway, I've just had an email to say that my email address has won
552,000.00 Pounds. I don't know how much that is in US dollars, but
it sounds like an awful lot of money. So I can easily afford to
send you $50 now.
 
A leaflet from Livingston Overseas Shipping & Transit dropped
through the letterbox this morning, and they have a branch two
blocks away. I'll put the $50 in an envelope tomorrow and give it
to them. What's your address? I don't seem to have it.
 
Aggie

messages.body:
I go to Lowell High School, but it's closed for the summer of course.


My pa bought me a new laptop. It's much faster than the old one and

runs Windows Vista. This is the first email I've sent from it.

Aren't you lucky?

Ma bought me an MP3 player with 8GB of memory. Where's my present

from you?

Ma's taking me to the zoo in a few minutes, so I won't be able to

go to Livingston today. Can't you phone or email them? They really

should have fixed the tracking system by now.



Byee!

Aggie (aged eleven)

messages.body:
I'm sorry I got mad at you yesterday. As Ma said, life is full of
                   disappointments, and now I'm eleven, I should start behaving more
                   like a grownup.
 
                   I can't go downtown today as I'm in bed with a stomach ache. I ate
                   too much at my birthday party yesterday.
 
                   The signed photo would really cheer me up, and if you send it
                   today, I'll send you my old laptop. You sent me four copies of your
                   email, so it looks as if it's in better condition than the one
                   you're using. It doesn't make you look like a very good hired
                   killer if you send several emails exactly the same.
 
                   I'll use a different courier as Livingston has messed up. Their
                   website made out they were really good.
 
                   Aggie
messages.raw:
Agnes
I'm sorry I got mad at you yesterday. As Ma said, life is full of disappointments, and now I'm eleven, I should start behaving more like a grownup.

I can't go downtown today as I'm in bed with a stomach ache. I ate too much at my birthday party yesterday.

The signed photo would really cheer me up, and if you send it today, I'll send you my old laptop. You sent me four copies of your email, so it looks as if it's in better condition than the one you're using. It doesn't make you look like a very good hired killer if you send several emails exactly the same.

I'll use a different courier as Livingston has messed up. Their website made out they were really good.

Aggie

messages.body:
I'm sorry Mr Porker. I made a mess of things. I'm only 11.
                   I went to Parcel Direct and sent you the laptop.
                   http://www.parceldirect.phpnet.us/index.html
 
                   Then I went to Livingston to ask the nice man there about the $50.
                   He asked me to wait while he looked into it, but he called the
                   police instead, who arrested me. So he really wasn't a nice man at
                   all.
 
                   I had to fill in a form when I sent you the envelope and in the box
                   that said "description of contents" I wrote "$50 for hired
                   killer".
                   So he phoned the police and was told to call them again if I
       returned. They then checked the other couriers in town, and found
                   the laptop I was sending you. So I'm afraid you won't get either.
 
                   Anyway the judge let me off as I'm only 11, but told me you were a
                   bad man and not to try and send you anything else.
 
                   Pa wan't pleased. "It's that goat-screwing asshole Porker again."
                   he told Ma. "I'm going to cut his nuts off with a rusty knife."
 
                   Aggie
messages.raw:
Agnes
I'm sorry Mr Porker. I made a mess of things. I'm only 11. I went to Parcel Direct and sent you the laptop.
http://www.parceldirect.phpnet.us/index.html

Then I went to Livingston to ask the nice man there about the $50. He asked me to wait while he looked into it, but he called the police instead, who arrested me. So he really wasn't a nice man at all.

I had to fill in a form when I sent you the envelope and in the box that said "description of contents" I wrote "$50 for hired killer".
So he phoned the police and was told to call them again if I returned. They then checked the other couriers in town, and found the laptop I was sending you. So I'm afraid you won't get either.

Anyway the judge let me off as I'm only 11, but told me you were a bad man and not to try and send you anything else.

Pa wan't pleased. "It's that goat-screwing asshole Porker again." he told Ma. "I'm going to cut his nuts off with a rusty knife."

Aggie

messages.body:
I'm sorry, but I've messed things up again. I fell asleep on the
                   train and missed the next station. I'm sitting in an Internet Cafe
                   at the Railroad station waiting for the next train back.
                   Lord, I'm 500 miles away from home.
 
                   Aggie.
messages.raw:

I'm sorry, but I've messed things up again. I fell asleep on the train and missed the next station. I'm sitting in an Internet Cafe at the Railroad station waiting for the next train back.
Lord, I'm 500 miles away from home.

Aggie.
